attributes.action: Ask the BBC to release Monkey Dust series 2 and 3 on DVD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC released Monkey Dust series 1 on DVD but have not released the 2nd and 3rd series due, according to sources, to the sensitivity of the issues depicted. I received no response when contacting the BBC directly.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
